title: Financial Analyst at Cameron Craig Group (Chicago, IL)
text: Source: Glass Door Local Higher Education organization is seeking a mid-level Financial Analyst to provide coordination function related to sponsored programs and other special accounts. Many of the funds that you will be working with have restricted use and will require your guidance for developing policies and procedures, assisting in financial reporting, administration and other that require the professional application of accounting principles, practice and techniques in accordance with industry standards, current laws and policy. Should be within GAAP and government regulations. If you apply for the position please make it clear that you have at least 60% of the requirements below. Duties and Responsibilities - attend training and stay abreast of compliance - assist in financial activity including review of expenditures and other - write and maintain a funds handbook - work with IT to integrate activities into PeopleSoft - internal consulting activities - BS in Accounting or related - 5+ years in financial management environment - strong accounting principles experience - experience with computerized accounting systems including PeopleSoft or Raiser's Edge - Knowledge of OMB Uniform Guidance (Omni Circular) and federal funding agency award administration policies. - Knowledge of Fund Accounting practice by not for profit organizations.
